title: The Shining
description: Jack Torrance's new job at the "Overlook Hotel" is the perfect chance for a fresh start. As the off-season caretaker at the atmospheric old hotel, he'll have plenty of time to spend reconnecting with his family and working on his writing. But as the harsh winter weather sets in, the idyllic location feels ever more remote... And more sinister. And the only one to notice the strange and terrible forces gathering around the "Overlook" is Danny Torrance, a uniquely gifted five-year-old.Cut off by blizzards, the hotel seems to develop an evil force, and who are the mysterious guests in the supposedly empty hotel?
author: Stephen        King
